properties.name: discord.enabled
properties.description: Determines if Ai should connect to Discord.

properties.name: twitch.enabled
properties.description: Determines if Ai should connect to Twitch.

properties.name: twitch.commandPrefix
properties.description: The Character to expect for commands.

properties.name: command.sprint.sign-up-duration
properties.description: The default time to allow for people to sign up for sprints.

properties.name: command.sprint.in-progress-duration
properties.description: The default time for a sprint to run.

properties.name: command.sprint.awaiting-counts-duration
properties.description: The default time to wait for people to submit counts after sprint has run.
